EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Apigee I Love APIs_Chicago_Q218.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Free Pivotal eBook | Cloud-Native Java
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Thank you for stopping by the Pivotal booth at I Love API's <[[https://apigee.com/api-management/#/mde-detail/1133?utm_source=partner&utm_medium=Pivotal&utm_campaign=iloveapis_chicago]]> Chicago <[[https://apigee.com/api-management/#/mde-detail/1133?utm_source=partner&utm_medium=Pivotal&utm_campaign=iloveapis_chicago]]> <[[https://apigee.com/api-management/#/mde-detail/1133?utm_source=partner&utm_medium=Pivotal&utm_campaign=iloveapis_chicago]]>. You can download your free copy of Josh Long <[[https://twitter.com/starbuxman?lang=en]]> and Kenny Bastani's <[[https://twitter.com/kennybastani?lang=en]]> eBook, Cloud-Native Java: Designing Resilient Systems with Spring Boot, Spring Cloud, and Cloud Foundry, HERE <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/cloud-native-java-ebook]]>. If you would like more information about Pivotal or if you have any questions, please contact me at eandersen@pivotal.io <[[mailto:eandersen@pivotal.io]]>. I would love to learn more about how you're developing cloud-native applications at your company. Erik Andersen & The Pivotal Team It's time to level-up. Join your peers at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/]]> to pick up new skills and new ideas for building better software, faster. Use my discount code to get $200 off the posted price: S1P200_EAndersen
